merpi_desc: %USER's long bare mouse tail, you probably shouldn't snort it. You could reach out and...

merpi_normal: %USER just starts beating the absolute hell out of %TARGET's %T_PART with their long bare mouse tail!!
merpi_flowery: %USER just starts beating the absolute hell out of %TARGET's %T_PART with their long bare mouse tail!!

merpi_normal: %USER softly caresses their long bare mouse tail across %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER softly caresses their long bare mouse tail across %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_repeat: %USER brushes their long bare mouse tail to %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_normal: %USER guides %TARGET's %T_PART to their long bare mouse tail with soft caresses.
merpi_flowery: %USER guides %TARGET's %T_PART to their long bare mouse tail with soft caresses.
merpi_repeat: %USER presses %TARGET's %T_PART into their long bare mouse tail.

merpi_repeat: %USER rubs their long bare mouse tail across %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_repeat: %USER rubs %TARGET's %T_PART against their long bare mouse tail.

merpi_repeat: %USER wraps their long bare mouse tail around %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_flowery: %USER squeezes %TARGET's %T_PART with their long bare mouse tail maybe a bit too hard.
merpi_repeat: %USER squeezes %TARGET's %T_PART with their long bare mouse tail.

merpi_flowery: %USER whacks %TARGET's %T_PART with their long bare mouse tail, ow!
